# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe the changes in this PR.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature / project
- [ ] New track / notebook
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup

## Area

- [ ] Cybersecurity
- [ ] Adversarial ML
- [ ] LLM security
- [ ] Docs / tooling

## Difficulty level

- [ ] Beginner
- [ ] Intermediate
- [ ] Advanced

## Checklist

- [ ] I have linked an issue or explained why this change does not need one.
- [ ] I have tested the changes (or explained why they are not easily testable).
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation / README files, if needed.
